text: Mukati memaJudha, mune avo vanosandurudza mazwi kubva munzvimbo dzavo (mazwi) uye vanoti: “Tinonzwa mashoko ako (Muhammad (SAW)) asi hatitevedzeri.” Uye “Inzwa, asi iwe (Muhammad SAW)) usanzwe chinhu.” Uye “Raaina (izwi rekutuka muchiJudha)” vachishandura ndimi dzavo uye vachishora chitendero (cheIslaam). Asi dai vakangoti: “Tinonzwa nekuteerera, asi usave unoita kuti tinzwisise,” zvaiva nani kwavari uye zvakanakisisa; asi Allah vakavarengera nekusatenda kwavo, saka havatendi kunze kwevashoma
